conversion_verification.notes: Successful volumetric 3D extrusions of the floor plan into an isometric cutaway.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Excellent 3D transformation with clear wall heights, thickness, and volumetric consistency.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Highly faithful layout reproduction. Minor simplification of window frames in outer walls, but room counts and adjacencies are perfect.

interior_elements.notes: Furniture placement matches the 2D plan precisely in both type and location.

visual_clarity.notes: Good lighting and modeling; score reduced due to AI-generated text/garbled labels on the 3D surface.

detected_errors.description: Garbled text labels present on the 3D model surfaces.

summary: An exceptionally faithful 3D conversion that maintains near-perfect geometric and inventory parity with the original floor plan.
